dcterms:creator: Y. Lou
Y. Bai
J. Liu
S. Wang
L.-Y. Duan
dcterms:description: A challenging benchmark in vehicle instance retrieval that contains about 50,000 images of 776 vehicle identities across 20 cameras, with various viewpoints, illuminations, and occlusions.
dcterms:title: VeRi-776

dcterms:creator: H. Liu
Y. Tian
Y. Yang
L. Pang
T. Huang
dcterms:description: A widely-used vehicle instance retrieval dataset containing vehicle images captured in the daytime by multiple cameras, with a total of 221,763 images of 26,267 vehicles.
dcterms:title: VehicleID

dcterms:creator: A. KanacÄ±
X. Zhu
S. Gong
dcterms:description: A realistic vehicle instance retrieval benchmark with unconstrained variations of images in resolution, motion blur, illumination, occlusion, and multiple viewpoints, containing 60,430 images of 5,622 vehicle identities.
dcterms:title: VRIC

dcterms:creator: X. Liu
W. Liu
T. Mei
H. Ma
dcterms:description: A large dataset for vehicle re-identification in the wild, containing 416,314 vehicle images of 40,671 IDs captured by 174 cameras, with various subsets for training and testing.
dcterms:title: VERI-Wild
